values.CloningRepository-ErrorTitle: There was an error while cloning:
values.SettingsGeneral-DontShow: Don't warn me about external scripts
values.SettingsGeneral-DontShowExplanation: It's important that you fully understand what a script does before you enable it
values.SettingsAbout-ProtectedBy: This software is protected by the GNU GPLv3 licence:
values.repository.ts-BranchUnavailable-Message: Could not find the changeset for the branch: ${branchName}
values.repository.ts-UnknownBranch-Message: Could not process one of the found branches
values.repository.ts-UnknownTag-Message: Could not process one of the found tags
values.repository.ts-CommitFailed-Message: An error occurred while commiting. See log files for details
values.NewGroup-EnterAName: You need to enter a name for the group
values.NewGroup-EnterALocation: You need to enter a location for the group
values.NewGroup-NotValidLocation: The given location is not a valid folder path
values.CloneNew-Title: Clone and open a repository locally
values.CloneNew-EnterALocation: You need to enter a remote location to clone from
values.CloneNew-EnterALocalocation: You need to enter a local folder location to clone the repository to
values.CloneNew-NotValidLocation: The given local location already exists
values.ScriptWarning-Message1: Only use scripts which either you wrote, or you have examined to the point where you understand their functionality fully.
values.ScriptWarning-Message2: Scripts have full access to your machine and have the potential to be malicious or cause serious harm if used improperly.
values.ScriptWarning-DontShowReEnable: It can always be re-enabled in the app settings
values.ScriptAPI-UnableToFindRepository-Message: Unable to create or find the repository: ${repositoryName}
